website_summaries.verdict: With an updated Intel processor and speedier Flash Storage, the MacBook Pro 15-inch (2013) leapfrogs over the competition with workstation-class performance and a nine-hour battery life. It's our new Editors' Choice for high-end desktop replacement laptops.
pros: Almost nine hours of battery life
Comes with iLife and iWork software suites
Intel Iris Pro graphics performs like discrete GPUs

customer_reviews.title: The laptop is wonderful and the graphics are absolutely superb
customer_reviews.text: I had always assumed that the manner in which Apple users praised their system and cursed Microsoft was nothing but propaganda but I was worn down by the relentless tales and I finally switched. Wow! the stories are absolutely true. Yosemite is to Windows 8 as a Derby winner is to a donkey on the beach. The laptop is wonderful and the graphics are absolutely superb. It seems churlish to find any faults but the need for a large touchpad makes the keyboard less comfortable and leaving out the DVD drive to make it slimmer is plain daft - I have never been convinced by any form over function argument!
customer_reviews.author: Nicky Bacon

customer_reviews.title: apple do it again with excellent mac book pro 15.4"
customer_reviews.text: Bought mac book pro 15.4" as update of my 09 mac book. Still impressed. Wasted £300 on Toshiba last year. Broken twice since. Need to install so much to make it half the computer a mac is. And the cost! Wow! Should have stuck to gut feeling. Excellent professional photo editing, and so familiar. So happy.
customer_reviews.author: Rigdeback

customer_reviews.title: Mac book pro laptop- nice one
customer_reviews.text: Mac book pro is very nice and comfotable laptop. I really like it. It is different then the one I had before ages. It is very easy to find things on it and learn,faster when youclick files it shows on one side symbols on how to copy, paste or drleye things and more. Do happy with it. I aslo bought a cover which cost me a lot of moneybut it is ok. :)
customer_reviews.author: radi

customer_reviews.title: This computer is absaloutely amazing!! Had it six months now and love ...
customer_reviews.text: This computer is absaloutely amazing!! Had it six months now and love everything about it. Just moved from Windows which i have been with for the past 15 years. Every thing is so quick and painless. Runs like a dream. Cannot fault it one bit.I will never go back to windows again. The old saying, you get what you pay for, and you do!
customer_reviews.author: Les910

customer_reviews.title: Genuine Market Leader, but comes at a cost
customer_reviews.text: Expensive for a laptop and OSX isn't as great as it once was. That being said, it still is hands down the best laptop I have owned. I am not some crazy Apple fan boy - I have used and liked some other top on PC laptops, its just that this one - the keyboard, the screen - overall - it stands out against the others.
customer_reviews.author: Mukser

customer_reviews.title: Love my Apple MacBook
customer_reviews.text: This is a genuine Apple MacBook although meant for the American market as it has a USA keyboard (already mentioned by other buyers). Therefore I have the product I wanted and expected at a competitive price. I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Sonia Boulden

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop, period.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing...as expected. Replaced my old Macbook pro after 8 years of excellent service. You can always argue that it is overpriced; but quality has a price tag, and I see how my colleagues and friends go through Windows Laptops every couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo Fermin

customer_reviews.title: Great product, delivered on time
customer_reviews.text: Really good service, I was a bit dubious buying a mac from anywhere other than the apple store, but what I got was sealed, genuine and perfect!
customer_reviews.author: duane wingell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: arrived in good time as was the price.i bought this laptop for my wife and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: amazon man

customer_reviews.title: Good refurbished product at a realistic price.
customer_reviews.text: Does everything as advertised. Good refurbished product at a realistic price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Bray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Be prepared to spend a lot for extended warranty. But helpline good. Like apple , can't stand windows.
customer_reviews.author: HOPELESSLY LOST

customer_reviews.title: It would be better to make it clear that this is not a ...
customer_reviews.text: It is brand new with fast delivery! It would be better to make it clear that this is not a UK version product. But it works fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Yongsheng Gao

customer_reviews.title: Spot on!
customer_reviews.text: Everything as expected: product sealed, original packaging. Ordered on a Saturday, delivered on the following Tuesday!
customer_reviews.author: Arsène knows!!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic and 25% cheaper than the Apple website, perfect product
customer_reviews.author: Mark Green

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says on the tin. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My First Mac
customer_reviews.text: Came boxed and sealed, with all accessories as to be expected. Runs like a dream using Adobe software (Dreamweaver, Photoshop, Illustrator etc.). Runs most games with ease, obviously more demanding games will require dedicated graphics card, so I'd suggest the 2.5GHz version with the NVidia for those who wish to do a lot of heavy duty gaming, but again this 2.2GHz version will work with ease on most games. I highly suggest this product, solid, sturdy, and just a beautiful machine.
customer_reviews.author: Callum Rocks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: brought for my daughter at uni - very happy with this laptop
customer_reviews.author: John Boreham

customer_reviews.title: SUPER that is only word I can say.
customer_reviews.text: Received before I expected, and it's pretty good. What to review about Macbook which done by so many experts. It's wonderful to work and so FAST.
customer_reviews.author: Anand Kumar Padigala

customer_reviews.title: Utterly wonderful. Everything I hoped it would be
customer_reviews.text: Utterly wonderful. Everything I hoped it would be, and the support from Apple has been first rate.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Ridsdale

customer_reviews.title: An Apple a day....
customer_reviews.text: The MacBook Pro was delivered safely and undamaged. I unpacked it and powered up the laptop and it worked OK and still is like a Mac should do.
customer_reviews.author: Kiwipete

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant laptop
customer_reviews.text: Excellent laptop with excellent operating system, does need a bit of training to start with but once you get to know it, you will love it
customer_reviews.author: Sohail Khan

customer_reviews.title: D A TECH Sold me a stolen Apple MacBook Pro with Retina Display, MJLQ2B/A, 15.4" Intel Core i7, 256GB Flash Storage,
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an Apple MacBook Pro with Retina Display, MJLQ2B/A, 15.4" Intel Core i7, 256GB Flash Storage, 16GB RAM (UK Model - UK Keyboard) from D A Tech on 12 May. This arrived yesterday. When I attempted to setup for first use the following message appeared on the screen "PLEASE CALL 01347 812100 OR ALTERNATIVELY CONTACT THE POLICE WITH THE FOLLOWING REFERENCE NUMBER - NYT05052016/0304" I have written to Seller no reply received yet. Do not buy from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
